review_data.title: Delicious lunch

review_data.title: Healthiest and Fresh lunch in Zurich
review_data.content: The staff is so friendly and showed me english menu and advised of most popular items among the locals. I had the Joes Club Sandwich and Sport Juice drink. Felt so refreshed and not heavy feeling from the sandwich. Def would come back here again...More

review_data.title: Tasty juices
review_data.content: Finally a place with tasty juices. Good range of choices. Would come back again. But, yeah, a lot of plastic. Pity.
